Key Match Events: Corbin Carroll hit a game-winning grand slam in the eighth inning
Pete Alonso hit a two-run homer in the fourth inning
Starling Marte scored the go-ahead run with a headfirst dive on a steal attempt
Post-Match Reflections: Edwin Diaz expressed frustration over his poor performance
Carlos Mendoza stated that Diaz will make adjustments and be ready to go
Luis Severino plans to make his next start despite soreness from a line drive to his foot
Miscellaneous Highlights: Luis Guillorme played against his former team for the third time this season
Severino underwent X-rays that were negative after getting hit by a line drive
